title: GMAI-VL-R1: Harnessing Reinforcement Learning for Multimodal Medical Reasoning
details: Y Su, T Li, J Liu, C Ma, J Ning, C Tang, S Ju, J Ye… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2025
abstract: Recent advances in general medical AI have made significant strides, but existing models often lack the reasoning capabilities needed for complex medical decision- making. This paper presents GMAI-VL-R1, a multimodal medical reasoning model …
